projects.first-project-description: Welcome to 'Blackjack on the Web', an exciting project that immerses you in the classic Blackjack card game experience directly from your browser. This project combines the fundamental web technologies: HTML, CSS and JavaScript, to deliver an interactive and engaging gaming experience.
